full_text: It’s very unfortunate that the civil war and carnage in Sudan have continued unabated. The suffering of civilians is quite unimaginable. The situation has been further deteriorating very recently. As a home to tens of thousands of refugees from Tigray and also of other parts of
truncated_full_text: It’s very unfortunate that the civil war and carnage in Sudan have continued unabated. The suffering of civilians is quite unimaginable. The situation has been further deteriorating very recently. As a home to tens of thousands of refugees from Tigray and also of other parts of Ethiopia, we are particularly concerned that the war theatre is coming dangerously close to refugee camps in eastern Sudan- to #Tenedba and #Umrakuba, among others.  While the humanitarian situation in those camps has always been dire, the growing proximity of the actual fighting to those areas has made it even more unsettling. It is therefore imperative that regional players with influence on the warring parties as well as the international community at large exert pressure on both sides to immediately halt fighting and protect civilians as best they can. It’s also incumbent upon the government of the FDRE to do whatever it takes to end the suffering of Ethiopian refugees.

full_text: Today I joined Ambassador Shibata Hirinori of @JapanEthiopia in a groundbreaking event at Negash(Nejashi) for the rehabilitation of an elementary school and a high school totally destroyed during the war on Tigray. The Ambassador underscored Japanese government commitment to help https://t.co/Dxj2e6hLoD
truncated_full_text: Today I joined Ambassador Shibata Hirinori of @JapanEthiopia in a groundbreaking event at Negash(Nejashi) for the rehabilitation of an elementary school and a high school totally destroyed during the war on Tigray. The Ambassador underscored Japanese government commitment to help in the recovery and rehabilitation efforts in Tigray. Japan has since the signing of the Pretoria agreement been supporting Tigray on a number of areas including healthcare, education, water and sanitation, supply of improved seeds as well as in the reintegration of combatants. The Embassy has also been collaborating with @UNICEFEthiopia & other agencies in similar endeavors in Tigray. These programs are expected to be further enhanced in the next two or three years.

full_text: Today I met & held discussion with Ms. Sheena Sen Gupta, @UNICEF Global Director of Child Protection here in #Mekelle. Ms. Gupta was here in Tigray to visit UNICEF activities in the region and exchange views with regional officials on how to better coordinate her organization’s https://t.co/CI3fknY5BI
truncated_full_text: Today I met & held discussion with Ms. Sheena Sen Gupta, @UNICEF Global Director of Child Protection here in #Mekelle. Ms. Gupta was here in Tigray to visit UNICEF activities in the region and exchange views with regional officials on how to better coordinate her organization’s efforts in various areas of endeavor including GBV, health and sanitation as well as nutrition as relates mainly to children and women. She also expressed her organization’s readiness to further enhance its support for IDPs. She also expressed her appreciation of the resilience that tigrayan women displayed even in the face of extreme adversity and vowed to explore ways of supporting programs that focus on improving livelihoods apart of routine humanitarian interventions. I took the opportunity to express our Administration’s appreciation of UNICEF’s stellar performance in most of the activities it has undertaken in Tigray and called on her to help scale up some of the successful models. I also expressed our government’s commitment to continue to work closely with the UNICEF and other organizations currently operating in Tigray.

Similar moves to return more Tigrayan IDPs are in the pipeline.

full_text: The TPLF leadership and high level representatives of the Prosperity Party held another round of  discussions on various issues of far reaching significance to peace & stability in the country. The discussion was conducted in a very cordial manner. The discussion mainly focused https://t.co/vVBaOiu102
truncated_full_text:
The TPLF leadership and high level representatives of the Prosperity Party held another round of  discussions on various issues of far reaching significance to peace & stability in the country. The discussion was conducted in a very cordial manner. The discussion mainly focused on peace building and the need to work closely to that end. 
In the meantime, IRA leaders today held discussions with @MikeHammerUSA and Ambassador Ervin Masinga of @USEmbassyAddis in Addis Ababa on a range of issues including on the major challenges in the implementation of the Pretoria Agreement & the way forward. Both sides underscored the need to review the progress so far with a view to expeditiously addressing lingering challenges.

user.description: President, Tigray Interim Regional Administration; ExecCommittee member, TPLF.
user.name: Getachew K Reda

full_text: Today I met and held discussions with Canadian development Minister #AhmedHussein on what needs to be done to ensure the full implementation of the Pretoria Agreement. He expressed his government’s commitment to support the efforts to deepen peace, to address the challenges https://t.co/a1TCDmALvh
truncated_full_text: Today I met and held discussions with Canadian development Minister #AhmedHussein on what needs to be done to ensure the full implementation of the Pretoria Agreement. He expressed his government’s commitment to support the efforts to deepen peace, to address the challenges standing in the way of progress and Canada’s unwavering support to recovery and rehabilitation efforts. While reiterating our commitment to lasting peace, we have also made it clear that there remain significant challenges ahead of us that require a concerted effort on the part of the IRA, the federal government and the international community to encourage bona fide engagement and to reign in  unruly elements bent on setting the clock back on the COHA.  The Minister also visited the war wounded as well as IDPs in and around Mekelle.

truncated_full_text: Today I met a delegation of Israeli parliamentary committee of  Ethiopia-Israeli friendship led by Knesset member @Moshe_solomon_ in Mekelle. full_text:
ኣብ ትግራይን ኣብ መላእ ዓለምን  እትነብር መላእ ተኸታሊ እምነት ክርስትና ህዝብናን ሓይልታት ፀጥታ ትግራይን እንቋዕ ንበዓል ፋሲካ ኣብፀሐኩም፣ ኣብፀሓና ክብል እፈቱ።።
ናይ ሎሚ ዘመን በዓል ፋሲካ/ትንሳኤ እንትነኽብር፣ ኣብ ውሽጥን
truncated_full_text:
ኣብ ትግራይን ኣብ መላእ ዓለምን  እትነብር መላእ ተኸታሊ እምነት ክርስትና ህዝብናን ሓይልታት ፀጥታ ትግራይን እንቋዕ ንበዓል ፋሲካ ኣብፀሐኩም፣ ኣብፀሓና ክብል እፈቱ።።
ናይ ሎሚ ዘመን በዓል ፋሲካ/ትንሳኤ እንትነኽብር፣ ኣብ ውሽጥን ደገን፣ኣብፎቖዶ መዕቖቢ ማእኸላትን ንዘሎ ዝተመዛበለ ህዝብና፣ ብድርቂ ዝተጠቕዐን ብሓፈሻ  ኣብ ሕሰምን መከራን ዝርከብ ህዝብና እናሓገዝና፣ ተኻፊልናን ተሓባቢርናን፣ ብሰላም፣ ብፍቕርን ሓድነትን ክነሕልፎ ይግባእ።
በዓል ፋሲካ እንትዝክር ከም ህዝቢ ካብቲ ኩለመዳይ ፅንተት፣ ዕንወትን ሃሰያን ወፂእና፣  ዝተመዛበለ ህዝብና ናብ መረበቱ ተመሊሱ፣ ኣብ ትሕቲ ወረርቲ ዝርከብ ህዝብና ሓራ ወፂኡ፣ ሉኣላውነት ትግራይ ተረጋጊፁ፣  ኹለመዳይ  ጉዕዞ  ሕውየት፣ ሰላም፣ ልምዓትን ዕብየትን ብሓዱሽ መንፈስን ብሓድነትን እነሳልጠሉን ንእንብርኸሉን በዓል ትንሳኤ ክኾነልና ሰናይ ትምኒተይ ክገልፅ እፈቱ።

ከም ህዝቢ ሰናይ ድልየትናን ባህግናን ክሰምር እንተኾይኑ፣  ንሰላም ዝተኸፍለ ረዚን መስዋእቲ ብዋጋ  ዕዳጋ ዝግመት ከምዘይኮነ ምስትምቓር ግድን እዩ። በቲ  ከም ህዝቢ ዝኸፈልናዮ ክቡር መስዋእቲ ከዓ ዛጊድ ፍረታት ሰላም ክንቋደስ ከምዘኽኣለና ምርዳእ ኣድላዪ እዩ።  እዚ ሰላም ዘጨብጠና ረብሓ መዳርግቲ ዘይብሉ ከምዝኾነ ኩሉ፣  ሰላም ምስኣን ድማ ዘስዕቦ ኪሳራ ዙርያ መለሽ ምዃኑ ግልፂ እዩ። ንሰላም ዝኽፈል ዋጋ ድማ መብዛሕትኦም ንህልዉናና ዝፃብኡ ነገራት ስለዘቕሪ ብቕጥዑን ብሚዛኑን ዋጋ ሰላም ምፍላጥ፣ ምስልሳልን ምርዳእን ኣገዳሲ እዩ። 

ንሕና ተጋሩ ዋጋ ሰላም ክንፈልጥ ሰላም ክንስእን ግድን ኣይኮነን። ኣብ መዋእልና ሰላም ስኢንና እንታይ እናኾንና ከምዝመፃእና ናይ ቀረባ ታሪክና ምስክር እዩ። ስለዚ ንህዝቢ ትግራይ ትርጉም ሰላም ከምህር ዝኽእል ዘሎ ኣይመስለንን። ርሑቕ ከይከድና ናብ ውዕል ሰላም ፕሪቶሪያ ንምብፃሕ ዝተኸፍለ ዋጋ ምዝካር ጥራሕ እኹል እዩ። ውሑስን ነባርን  ሰላም ምርግጋፅን ብሓፈሻ ሓርነት፣ ፍትሕን ማዕርነትን ምንጋስን ንፅባሕ ዘይበሃል ዋኒን እዩ። ካብ ዉግእ ዝኸስብ ዋላ ሓደ የለን። ሰላም ሰፊኑ ፣ ፍትሕን ማዕርነትን እንትነግስ ጥራሕ እውን እዩ ምልኣተ-ህዝብናን መላእ ሃገርን ድሕንነቶምን ረብሓኦምን ተዓቁቡ ውሑስና ዝረጋገፅ ።

ስለዝኾ ንመላእ ተከተልቲ እምነት ክርስትና ናይ ሰላም፣ ፍቕርን ምትሕልላይን በዓል ትንሳኤ ክኸውን ደጊመ ሰናይ ትምኒተይ እናገለፅኩ፣  ኣብ ዝኾነ ብርኪ መሪሕነት እትርከቡ ኣካላት ድማ፣ ኩሎም ውልቃዊ ድልየታትና ትሕቲ ህልውና፣ ሓድነትን ረብሓን ህዝብና ሰሪዕና፣ ናይ ህዝብና ናይ ህላወ፣ ሰላም፣ ምዕባለን ልምዓትን ባህጊን ጠለብን ኣብ ምግሃድን ንወለዶታት ዝቕፅል ታሪኽ ኣብ ምስራሕን ክንረባረብን ትንሳኤ ትግራይ ክነግህድን ይፅውዕ::

ሰናይ በዓል ፋሲካ!

full_text: RT @DrTedros: Amid fragile security and deteriorating humanitarian conditions, especially in health and nutrition, the people of Irob and Z…

legacy.description: Director-General of the World Health Organization. Retweets are not endorsements
legacy.name: Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus

result.text:
Amid fragile security and deteriorating humanitarian conditions, especially in health and nutrition, the people of Irob and Zalambessa in Tigray, Ethiopia, continue to be harassed and intimidated by Eritrean forces, including to forcibly change their identities.

Lasting peace cannot be achieved until people’s basic rights are assured and they are allowed to live freely and autonomously.

legacy.full_text: Eritrean forces issue ultimatum to residents of Irob & Zalambessa in Eastern Tigrai to change identity https://t.co/KK1mSyf5cH

Amid fragile security and deteriorating humanitarian conditions, especially in health and nutrition, the people of Irob and Zalambessa in Tigray, Ethiopia, continue to be harassed and intimidated by Eritrean forces, including to forcibly change their identities.

Lasting peace

legacy.description: Irob Anina Civil Society (IACS) is Canada-based & globally operating nonprofit to support & advocate for the #Irob minority & the people of #Tigray at large.
legacy.name: Irob Anina Civil Society (IACS)

result.text:
A shocking video clip (with English translation) ⬇️ out from the violently occupied #Irob district, Eastern Zone of #Tigray, confirms only what we already know: The #Eritrean regime is forcing a false Eritrean identity on the indigenous #Irob minority people with denial of aid & essential services & threatening them to comply with its compulsory 🇪🇷|n national military service (known as an indefinite slavery program) as they have forcibly been annexed to Eritrea. The video was filmed at a locality called #Alakalo, at Masi-Dage (junior high school) in Adgadi-Are/Edalgeda (northern subdistrict of Irob).

#EritreaOutOfTigray 
@StateDept @CanadaFP @FCDOGovUK @eu_eeas 

@MikeHammerUSA @reda_getachew @PMEthiopia @_AfricanUnion @4thPresidentKE @UNHumanRights @hrw @amnesty 

Here is the English translation of the video clip in Tigrinya: 
“As Eritreans, you too have to support the struggle of Eritreans and the Eritrean government. We are all Eritreans; there isn’t a distinction between you and us.
• All Eritreans must know that the Eritrean government was forced into the struggle and the suffering that is being faced; it had no desire to take part in it.
• Weyane (TPLF) is an agent; it doesn’t have the strength to challenge the Eritrean government. Both in the past (Ethio-Eritrean war) and presently, it is doing the bidding of other forces which are backing it.
• The struggle of the people and government of Eritrea is also your struggle. You should be proud of it. You should understand that the Eritrean government is winning by enduring all the sanctions and challenges not against the TPLF but the world. You should be proud of it if you are Eritrean.
• One elderly man has said, “We (the people of Irob) have gotten used to unlimited democracy under the TPLF leadership. Now you are telling us that we are under your administration. But you won’t be able to tolerate our ways.” This talk is what continues to be propagated. When we tread on this land of martyrs, we tread on it softly. But what has been coming from this side (TPLF) is very much despicable. You are people. But this is Eritrean territory. If you are Eritreans, you have to defend against what comes from the other side and collaborate with the Eritrean army.
• What is being reported is that there is no one from Irob who is providing information or collaborating with the Eritrean army. We will investigate it.
• The other thing is, it is being said that the Irob, although they consider themselves as Eritreans, have disagreements with the Eritrean government regarding humanitarian aid and the national service. But if you are Eritreans, whether you like it or not, you will have to go through the things that every Eritrean experiences.
• During the armed struggle, fighters who joined the Eritrean struggle from Irob have done their national duty and been martyred. Although, during the war, the land (of Irob) may, at different times, have switched hands between Eritrea and the TPLF, you know that your children and brothers have paid sacrifices for Eritrea during the armed struggle.
• If there is anyone who believes they are Ethiopian, the Eritrean government will not force anyone to remain here. But this territory belongs to Eritrea. And Eritreans reside on Eritrean territory. And Eritreans must abide by Eritrean rule like the other (Eritrean) people. If there is famine, you should starve like everyone else. If a few grains come, then you divide it with them and live like that. There will not be any preference.
• Regarding security in particular, lawlessness has been prevailing. They come from Adigrat and spend the night here; they go from here and spend the night in Senafe. And you don’t report this to us. Unless you provide information, the social service that you have been asking will not be provided. If you defend your homeland and your area, adequate social service will be provided as it will be able to continue preserving its peace. If you don’t collaborate, however, your demands will not be addressed. So, who is going to suffer? It is you who will suffer.” 1/2👇
